Model.Model_name: 2002 Total Nitrogen SPARROW Model for the Missouri River Basin

Constituent.Name: Nitrogen
Constituent.Description: 1992 regional E2RF1 total nitrogen model, includes U.S. portion of Oldman River Basin and the Missouri River Basin

Source.Name: Atmospheric N
Source.Description: Total inorganic nitrogen from atmospheric deposition

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that were determined by statistically significant by the modeler. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Atmospheric N Average Total Inorganic Nitrogen atmospheric (wet) deposition detrended for 2002 per Subbasin (kg) Manure N Sum total of Nitrogen from Manure in Confined and Unconfined Operations (kg) Farm Fertilizer N Sum total of Nitrogen Fertilizer from Farms (kg) Point sources N Sum total of nitrogen from point sources (average of 1992, 1997, and 2002 data) (kg) Developed Land 2001 NLCD developed land area, includes developed open space, low, medium, and high intensity (sqkm)
